One bit of advice...  We aren't Ant experts here, so I would (at least)
cross post this on the Ant mailing list.  This really has nothing to do
with JUnit, although if someone here has experienced that I am sure they
wouldn't mind speaking up.
 
=jason

-----Original Message-----
From: tek1 [mailto:tek1@...] 
Sent: Friday, September 20, 2002 1:48 AM
To: JUnit Mailing List
Subject: [junit] log messages not appearing when running ant


when i run my junit tests (via ant), i've specified in my
log4j.properties 
file to have DEBUG messages print out, but when i run my junit test
classes 
using ant, the log.debug(...) statements are not appearing.

any advice?

thank you.
